metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23772 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Rat.SetString in math/big in Go before 1.16.14 and 1.17.x before 1.17.7 has an overflow that can lead to Uncontrolled Memory Consumption.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> Packages built using golang need to be rebuilt once the vulnerability has been fixed. This CVE entry does not list packages that need rebuilding outside of the main repository or the Ubuntu variants with PPA overlays.

criterions.comment: golang-1.10 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.13: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
golang-1.16: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
golang-1.8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
golang-1.9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
